heading: Tuesday Night
text: Chance of wintry mix late in the St. Lawrence Valley.

heading: Wednesday
text: Periods of light wintry mix north.

heading: Thursday
temperature: Upper 30s to mid 40s, some mid 30s northeast

heading: Friday
text: Rain likely, then mixing with or changing to snow after noon.
temperature: Falling through the 30s west, and into the 30s east
